transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Prajapati ji baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kaun aa raha hai aapke sambandhi.
Customer: Ha bataye sir.
Executive: Sir kaun aa rahe hai sir aapne IndiaMART helpline pe Anju khadi thi kuch network ka issue tha baat nahi kar paye.
Customer: Ha baat nahi ho pa rahi thi ha bataye.
Executive: Bataye sir koi samasya hai sir.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Bataye sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi phone aapne kiya tha batayega kaun.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aapne hamare helpline pe phone kiya na sir 9696 pe.
Customer: Are aapke employee ne phone kiya tha lekin employee ki unki aawaz kat rahi thi to maine kaha hai aap dobara phone kar lijiye.
Executive: Achcha koi issue nahi hai to mai ek baar Anju se baat kara deta hu baat kar lijiye.
Customer: Baat kara dijiye unhone kya kaha tha mujhse.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Anju ji.
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: Namaste madam.
Executive: Namaskar sir.
Customer: Kya hua madam.
Executive: Sir aap sir aapne wo 9696 pe call kiya tha to mujhe janna tha koi problem to nahi hai na abhi waise.
Customer: Nahi nahi maine call hi nahi kiya kaha se aapko call mil gaya.
Executive: Sir lag gaya sir. Sir koi issue nahi hai mai isko.
Customer: Aaj maine call hi nahi kiya aapko aap aaj aap kisi number par.
Executive: Ha tabhi kisi se kyuki kal meri aapse baat bhi hui thi aisi koi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai isko kar deti hu close.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer reported call connectivity issues.

- Customer denies calling IndiaMART helpline today.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect with Anju.

- Executive closed the issue.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- helpline, call connectivity, verification
